All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.ai.utils.Location<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2>
public class Coin
extends Entity
Coin Creates an object for each coin Extends the entity class to define coin as an entity
Author:
Joe Dickinson

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the coins state. If needed, deletes the coin if picked up.

    • onContact

      public void onContact()
